reference.shortdesc: The tt (teletype) element is typically used to apply monospaced highlighting to the content of the element.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: For example, for specific items such as inline code fragments, use the codeph element.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The tt element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.

example.title: Example
